data.text:
@delwilliams I’m reacting to the glaring contrast between some of the nonsense in my feed and the horror these children are experiencing.

Side note: I will never cease to be amazed at how people on basically the same side will find a way to waste time by attacking each other on Twitter.

@maggiefox No there's not. It's amazing that people have the ability to be concerned about more than one thing. You focus solely on what you want and leave others alone. People are stepping up in their own way.
